description.value:
The ghost causes one creature within 30 feet to relive the ghost's death.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:] save or see and feel what the ghost did, taking @Damage[1d4[persistent,mental]] per 2 levels the ghost has.

All other creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] to the target until the persistent damage ends.
